And<S>2532</S> again<S>3825</S> he entered<S>1525</S> into<S>1519</S> Capernaum<S>2584</S> after<S>1223</S> some days<S>2250</S>; and<S>2532</S> it was noised<S>191</S> that<S>3754</S> he was<S>2076</S> in<S>1519</S> the house<S>3624</S>.
And<S>2532</S> straightway<S>2112</S> many<S>4183</S> were gathered together<S>4863</S>, insomuch that<S>5620</S> there was<S>5562</S> no<S>3371</S> room to receive<S>5562</S> them, no, not so much<S>3366</S> as about<S>4314</S> the door<S>2374</S>: and<S>2532</S> he preached<S>2980</S> the word<S>3056</S> unto them<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> they come<S>2064</S> unto<S>4314</S> him<S>846</S>, bringing<S>5342</S> one sick of the palsy<S>3885</S>, which was borne<S>142</S> of<S>5259</S> four<S>5064</S>.
And<S>2532</S> when they could<S>1410</S> not<S>3361</S> come nigh<S>4331</S> unto him<S>846</S> for<S>1223</S> the press<S>3793</S>, they uncovered<S>648</S> the roof<S>4721</S> where<S>3699</S> he was<S>2258</S>: and<S>2532</S> when they had broken it up<S>1846</S>, they let down<S>5465</S> the bed<S>2895</S> wherein<S>1909</S> <S>3739</S> the sick of the palsy<S>3885</S> lay<S>2621</S>.
When<S>1161</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> saw<S>1492</S> their<S>846</S> faith<S>4102</S>, he said<S>3004</S> unto the sick of the palsy<S>3885</S>, Son<S>5043</S>, thy<S>4675</S> sins<S>266</S> be forgiven<S>863</S> thee<S>4671</S>.
But<S>1161</S> there were<S>2258</S> certain<S>5100</S> of the scribes<S>1122</S> sitting<S>2521</S> there<S>1563</S>, and<S>2532</S> reasoning<S>1260</S> in<S>1722</S> their<S>846</S> hearts<S>2588</S>,
Why<S>5101</S> doth<S>2980</S> this<S>3778</S> man thus<S>3779</S> speak<S>2980</S> blasphemies<S>988</S>? who<S>5101</S> can<S>1410</S> forgive<S>863</S> sins<S>266</S> but<S>1508</S> God<S>2316</S> only<S>1520</S>?
And<S>2532</S> immediately<S>2112</S> when Jesus<S>2424</S> perceived<S>1921</S> in his<S>846</S> spirit<S>4151</S> that<S>3754</S> they so<S>3779</S> reasoned<S>1260</S> within<S>1722</S> themselves<S>1438</S>, he said<S>2036</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Why<S>5101</S> reason ye<S>1260</S> these things<S>5023</S> in<S>1722</S> your<S>5216</S> hearts<S>2588</S>?
Whether<S>5101</S> is it<S>2076</S> easier<S>2123</S> to say<S>2036</S> to the sick of the palsy<S>3885</S>, Thy sins<S>266</S> be forgiven<S>863</S> thee<S>4671</S>; or<S>2228</S> to say<S>2036</S>, Arise<S>1453</S>, and<S>2532</S> take up<S>142</S> thy<S>4675</S> bed<S>2895</S>, and<S>2532</S> walk<S>4043</S>?
But<S>1161</S> that<S>2443</S> ye may know<S>1492</S> that<S>3754</S> the Son<S>5207</S> of man<S>444</S> hath<S>2192</S> power<S>1849</S> on<S>1909</S> earth<S>1093</S> to forgive<S>863</S> sins<S>266</S>, (he saith<S>3004</S> to the sick of the palsy<S>3885</S>,)
I say<S>3004</S> unto thee<S>4671</S>, Arise<S>1453</S>, and<S>2532</S> take up<S>142</S> thy<S>4675</S> bed<S>2895</S>, and<S>2532</S> go thy way<S>5217</S> into<S>1519</S> thine<S>4675</S> house<S>3624</S>.
And<S>2532</S> immediately<S>2112</S> he arose<S>1453</S>, took up<S>142</S> the bed<S>2895</S>, and<S>2532</S> went forth<S>1831</S> before<S>1726</S> them all<S>3956</S>; insomuch that<S>5620</S> they were<S>1839</S> all<S>3956</S> amazed<S>1839</S>, and<S>2532</S> glorified<S>1392</S> God<S>2316</S>, saying<S>3004</S>,<S>3754</S> We<S>1492</S> never<S>3763</S> saw<S>1492</S> it on this fashion<S>3779</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he went forth<S>1831</S> again<S>3825</S> by<S>3844</S> the sea side<S>2281</S>; and<S>2532</S> all<S>3956</S> the multitude<S>3793</S> resorted<S>2064</S> unto<S>4314</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> he taught<S>1321</S> them<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> as he passed by<S>3855</S>, he saw<S>1492</S> Levi<S>3018</S> the son of Alphaeus<S>256</S> sitting<S>2521</S> at<S>1909</S> the receipt of custom<S>5058</S>, and<S>2532</S> said<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Follow<S>190</S> me<S>3427</S>. And<S>2532</S> he arose<S>450</S> and followed<S>190</S> him<S>846</S>.at the: or, at the place where the custom was received
And<S>2532</S> it came to pass<S>1096</S>, that<S>1722</S>, as Jesus<S>846</S> sat at meat<S>2621</S> in<S>1722</S> his<S>846</S> house<S>3614</S>, many<S>4183</S> publicans<S>5057</S> and<S>2532</S> sinners<S>268</S> sat<S>4873</S> also<S>2532</S> together with<S>4873</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> and<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S>: for<S>1063</S> there were<S>2258</S> many<S>4183</S>, and<S>2532</S> they followed<S>190</S> him<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> when the scribes<S>1122</S> and<S>2532</S> Pharisees<S>5330</S> saw<S>1492</S> him<S>846</S> eat<S>2068</S> with<S>3326</S> publicans<S>5057</S> and<S>2532</S> sinners<S>268</S>, they said<S>3004</S> unto his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S>, How<S>5101</S> is it that<S>3754</S> he eateth<S>2068</S> and<S>2532</S> drinketh<S>4095</S> with<S>3326</S> publicans<S>5057</S> and<S>2532</S> sinners<S>268</S>?
When<S>2532</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> heard<S>191</S> it, he saith<S>3004</S> unto them<S>846</S>, They that are whole<S>2480</S> have<S>2192</S> no<S>3756</S> need<S>5532</S> of the physician<S>2395</S>, but<S>235</S> they that are<S>2192</S> sick<S>2560</S>: I came<S>2064</S> not<S>3756</S> to call<S>2564</S> the righteous<S>1342</S>, but<S>235</S> sinners<S>268</S> to<S>1519</S> repentance<S>3341</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the disciples<S>3101</S> of John<S>2491</S> and<S>2532</S> of the Pharisees<S>5330</S> used<S>2258</S> to fast<S>3522</S>: and<S>2532</S> they come<S>2064</S> and<S>2532</S> say<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Why do<S>1302</S> <S>3522</S> the disciples<S>3101</S> of John<S>2491</S> and<S>2532</S> of the Pharisees<S>5330</S> fast<S>3522</S>, but<S>1161</S> thy<S>4674</S> disciples<S>3101</S> fast<S>3522</S> not<S>3756</S>?
And<S>2532</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> said<S>2036</S> unto them<S>846</S>, <S>3361</S> Can<S>1410</S> the children<S>5207</S> of the bridechamber<S>3567</S> fast<S>3522</S>, while<S>1722</S> <S>3739</S> the bridegroom<S>3566</S> is<S>2076</S> with<S>3326</S> them<S>846</S>? as long as<S>3745</S> <S>5550</S> they have<S>2192</S> the bridegroom<S>3566</S> with<S>3326</S> them<S>1438</S>, they cannot<S>3756</S> <S>1410</S> fast<S>3522</S>.
But<S>1161</S> the days<S>2250</S> will come<S>2064</S>, when<S>3752</S> the bridegroom<S>3566</S> shall be taken away<S>522</S> from<S>575</S> them<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> then<S>5119</S> shall they fast<S>3522</S> in<S>1722</S> those<S>1565</S> days<S>2250</S>.
No man<S>3762</S> also<S>2532</S> seweth<S>1976</S> a piece<S>1915</S> of new<S>46</S> cloth<S>4470</S> on<S>1909</S> an old<S>3820</S> garment<S>2440</S>: else<S>1490</S> the new piece<S>2537</S> that filled it up<S>4138</S> taketh away<S>142</S> from<S>846</S> the old<S>3820</S>, and<S>2532</S> the rent<S>4978</S> is made<S>1096</S> worse<S>5501</S>. <sup>new cloth: or, raw, or, unwrought cloth</sup>
And<S>2532</S> no man<S>3762</S> putteth<S>906</S> new<S>3501</S> wine<S>3631</S> into<S>1519</S> old<S>3820</S> bottles<S>779</S>: else<S>1490</S> the new<S>3501</S> wine<S>3631</S> doth burst<S>4486</S> the bottles<S>779</S>, and<S>2532</S> the wine<S>3631</S> is spilled<S>1632</S>, and<S>2532</S> the bottles<S>779</S> will be marred<S>622</S>: but<S>235</S> new<S>3501</S> wine<S>3631</S> must be put<S>992</S> into<S>1519</S> new<S>2537</S> bottles<S>779</S>. <sup>bottles: or, sacks of skin</sup>
And<S>2532</S> it came to pass<S>1096</S>, that he<S>846</S> went<S>3899</S> through<S>1223</S> the corn fields<S>4702</S> on<S>1722</S> the sabbath day<S>4521</S>; and<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S> began<S>756</S>, as they went<S>3598</S> <S>4160</S>, to pluck<S>5089</S> the ears of corn<S>4719</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the Pharisees<S>5330</S> said<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Behold<S>2396</S>, why<S>5101</S> do they<S>4160</S> on<S>1722</S> the sabbath day<S>4521</S> that which<S>3739</S> is<S>1832</S> not<S>3756</S> lawful<S>1832</S>?
And<S>2532</S> he<S>846</S> said<S>3004</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Have ye never<S>3763</S> read<S>314</S> what<S>5101</S> David<S>1138</S> did<S>4160</S>, when<S>3753</S> he had<S>2192</S> need<S>5532</S>, and<S>2532</S> was an hungred<S>3983</S>, he<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> they that were with<S>3326</S> him<S>846</S>?
How<S>4459</S> he went<S>1525</S> into<S>1519</S> the house<S>3624</S> of God<S>2316</S> in the days<S>1909</S> of Abiathar<S>8</S> the high priest<S>749</S>, and<S>2532</S> did eat<S>5315</S> the shewbread<S>740</S> <S>4286</S>, which<S>3739</S> is<S>1832</S> not<S>3756</S> lawful<S>1832</S> to eat<S>5315</S> but for<S>1508</S> the priests<S>2409</S>, and<S>2532</S> gave<S>1325</S> also<S>2532</S> to them which were<S>5607</S> with<S>4862</S> him<S>846</S>?
And<S>2532</S> he said<S>3004</S> unto them<S>846</S>, The sabbath<S>4521</S> was made<S>1096</S> for<S>1223</S> man<S>444</S>, and not<S>3756</S> man<S>444</S> for<S>1223</S> the sabbath<S>4521</S>:
Therefore<S>5620</S> the Son<S>5207</S> of man<S>444</S> is<S>2076</S> Lord<S>2962</S> also<S>2532</S> of the sabbath<S>4521</S>.
